wikipedia_page.main: David Wight (born 3 July 1959) is a  Caymanian politician and former cricket player  who played for the Cayman Islands national cricket team from 2000 to 2004.

response: *David Wight (cricketer) (born 1959), cricketer from the Cayman Islands
*David Wight (rower) (1934–2017), American gold medalist at the 1956 Melbourne Olympics
